dict.string: DriveLine needs access to your calendar to schedule driving lessons and car maintenance events.
DriveLine uses reminders to notify you of upcoming lessons, car service appointments, and other important tasks.
DriveLine uses your location to plan routes and identify driving school pickup or service locations.
DriveLine may access your contacts to link lessons or service appointments with specific instructors or mechanics.
We need speech recognition to understand your voice commands while driving
We need microphone access to listen to your commands
